original_title: Boston Mayor Wu dares AG Bondi to follow through on sanctuary threats | Fox News
article_summary: Boston Mayor Michelle Wu defiantly responds to Attorney General Pam Bondi's warning over sanctuary city policies, asserting that Boston follows the law and accusing the Trump administration of causing fear and harm in communities. Other leaders, including Washington Governor Bob Ferguson and Connecticut Attorney General William Tong, also push back against the federal government's threats.</s>
